nodeMetric.field_description: Email Total Clicks is the total number of times links were clicked in your email.

body.summary: Email Total Clicks is the total number of times links were clicked in your email.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Emails Opened is the number of unique recipients who opened your email. Because the number of people who open your email impacts every other downstream metric, such as clicks, it makes sense to pay special attention to this one.
Emails Bounced is the count of emails that were not successfully delivered. Specifically, it's the count of Non-Delivery Receipts from your recipients' email servers.
Emails Delivered is the number of contacts who successfully received an email to their inbox and, as such, does not include bounces or unsubscribed recipients.
